item.title: ASX
item.description: score:175 Chances: ASE Technology Holding achieves the best overall performance on the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices. ASE’s Bumping Factory in Kaohsiung, Taiwan inducted into the World Economic Forum’s Global Lighthouse Network. ASE announces advancements under the VIPack™ Platform. ASX reports positive Q2 2023 earnings results.
